original:
Spencer, sorry, I had to come back here - I think they were following me. I have no ammo and my radio is destroyed....I don't know how - they're everywhere. Why did I come here... 
The cloud is entering the outer building now... I hope it hides this place... 
Fuck....
What happened here, where has the med-lab gone? Just a wall now...
What the...
translation:
斯宾塞，对不起，我不得不回来这里，我觉得他们一直在跟踪我。
我没弹药了，无线电也坏了....
我不知道怎么回事，他们无处不在。
我为什么会来这里……
红雾正在进入外面的建筑…希望它能隐藏这个地方……
他妈的……
这里发生了什么，医学实验室去哪了?现在只有一堵墙了……
什么……

Just t t t t t t tttttx0010x make sure our manufacturing plant is running at 100% effeciency and thav_Sinclair's g00x4 don't8vbbvnt 6oo gn8ehJstind in whats 8DFNg_xx. 0231 banlk saasy should.xxx kb ...\nDATA CORRUPT
translation: 我为什么要为那件事担心呢?他们在2001年7月正在建造，我们从不雇用次等人才。只只只只要确保我们的制造工厂以100%的效率运行，确保辛辛克莱的工厂不处于什么位置。银行应该。XXX KB…\n数据损坏

original: Sorry Randall, I got cornered by a gang of Ghosts in Burkley’s Bar and dropped my sack with the key in it. I’m nearly out of ammo so I’m heading to the Medical safehouse for now. Hope you are OK,\nSpencer.
translation:
抱歉兰德尔，我在伯克利酒吧被一帮鬼人逼到角落里，
丢了我装钥匙的袋子。
我快没子弹了，所以我先去医疗安全屋了。希望你一切都好。
斯宾塞。

original:
Welcome to the Sierra Madre. Huh, looks like that old fool's map was right after all. Better be worth loosing my entire squad for. Again... They'll never accept me back at HQ now. Not that I could have saved them, thier human lungs couldn't deal with the cloud pockets that surrounded the aceess area. I'm better off alone. Same as ever.
The Casino is still standing strong and it looks like no humans have been here in years. There is some kind of lifeform that wanders the streets. They are totally hostile and do not respond to any communication. They also appear to be without emotion or fear but can still be dispatched easily enough with the correct equipment. My only concern is if I were to become heavily outnumbered by these beasts.
To add to the threat from the locals the gas cloud present in the town seems to be corrosive, even to my scarred flesh. To make matters worse the town itself it crumbling under its own weight and the Casino is under total lockdown.
Luckily I found a functioning turret unit out in the desert on the way in. It took a while to lug it back here, its anti-grav system was on the fritz, but it was worth it. Looks like it was built to last and can provide cover whilst I reinforce this house against the elements.
translation:
欢迎来到马德雷山脉赌场。
哼，看来那个老糊涂的地图最终还是对的。最好这一切能值得我牺牲整个小队。
再一次。他们再也不能回总部了。
就算我能救他们，他们那人类的肺也受不了通往这里区域的毒气云。
我一个人反而更好。和从前一样。
赌场依然屹立不倒，看起来已经多年没有人类踏足。
街上徘徊着某种生物，他们完全充满敌意，不回应任何沟通。
他们看起来也没有情绪或恐惧，但仍然可以很容易地用正确的装备。我唯一担心的是，
如果我被这些野兽大量包围怎么办。
除了这些本地威胁外，镇上弥漫的气体云似乎具有腐蚀性，就连我这身肉体也受不了。
更糟糕的是，小镇本身也在自己的重压下摇摇欲坠，
赌场则处于全面封锁状态。
幸运的是，我在沙漠中找到了一个功能正常的炮塔装置。
虽然把它拖回来费了些时间，它的反重力系统也出了点问题，
但这一切都是值得的。
看起来它很坚固，可以在我加固这房子以抵御外界威胁时提供掩护。

original: Found I was not alone today. I met another Ghoul by the name of Dean who has been living out here for the last 200 years, pretty much all on his own from what I could tell. He did not seem particularly happy to see me. He seems to think he has a way into the casino so I tried playing the dumb grunt role but he was having none of it. Seems he has had his eye on me for a while and I think he may even see me as a threat now. Damn, he’d better not try anything, I could do without another death on my conscience. He did inform me of another resident, a Nightkin by the name of Dog, who by the sound of it is probably worth avoiding. He spends most of his time at the Police Station screaming his own name apparently. \nPersonally I have had no luck finding a way into the Casino and have found little of value in the town itself. The technology behind the vending machines could be worth a lot but I have yet to stumble onto any schematics for the machines themselves. \nThe way I see it I have two options now, either use my limited engineering skills to reverse engineer the internal workings of the Vending machines in order to program a device that would allow me access to the Casino or befriend Dean and find out what he knows. I am unsure which would be easiest course of action right now.
translation:
今天我发现我并不孤单。我遇到了另一个名为迪恩的尸鬼
他已经在这里独自生活了200年
据我所知，他一直都是一个人。他见到我似乎不是特别高兴。他似乎认为他有办法进入赌场。
所以我试着装傻充愣，但他并不买账。
看起来他已经注意我很久了，我甚至觉得他可能现在把我当作威胁。
该死，他最好别乱来，我可不想再有任何死亡让我感到内疚。
他确实告诉了我另一个居民，一个名叫狗的夜行族，听起来是得避开的人。
他大部分时间都在警察局尖叫自己的名字。
就我个人而言，我还没有找到进入赌场的方法，在镇上也没有发现太多有价值的东西。
自动售货机背后的技术可能很有价值，
但我还没有找到这些机器的图纸。
在我看来，我现在有两个选择，
要么利用我有限的工程技能来逆向工程自动售货机的内部工作原理，
以便制造一个能够让我进入赌场的设备；
要么与迪恩交朋友，找出他所知道的信息。我现在不确定哪种方法会更容易些。

original: Trash can in the Sewer Worker's locker room.\nBe quick.
translation: 垃圾桶在下水道工人更衣室。\n动作要快。

original: Some guy called Elijah showed up yesterday. I have most of the villa rigged with cameras now and caught him on film briefly. It seems he has somehow enlisted the help of Dog and the pair are currently tearing through the Ghost People in the Medical District. I don’t like the looks of this, I’m gonna lie low and see what happens.
translation:
昨天来了个叫以利亚的家伙。
现在我已经在别墅的大部分地方安装了摄像头，还短暂地拍到了他的画面。
他似乎不知怎的拉拢了狗，现在他们两个正在医疗区绞杀鬼人。
我不喜欢这样，我要躲起来看看情况。

original: An NCR Ranger by the name of Spencer arrived today. By the sound of it Elijah has somehow initiated a distress beacon which lured her here. To what ends I don’t know but she passed below my apartment and I dropped her an old fashioned hand-radio so we can talk at length. Somehow she was drugged and has had a collar attached that will explode if see tries to remove it or escape. Elijah did this somehow, now he has told her she must wait until we have ‘two others’. I gave her some ammo and food, at least Elijah gave her a rifle to defend herself. I can’t let her in though. If Elijah is massing an army of slaves here then I sure as hell don’t wanna get caught up in the middle of it and I’ll bet those collars have tracking beacons in them.\nI'll have to make preperations to leave this area. I'll take over the sewers. The ferals down there seem to be non-hostile towards me and will provide efficient protection from the Ghosts and Elijah.
translation:
今天来了个名叫斯宾塞的NCR游骑兵。
听起来以利亚好像启动了求救信号把她引到了这里。
的目的我不清楚，
但她经过我的公寓时，我扔给她了一个老式手摇无线电，这样我们就可以长时间交谈了。
不知怎么的，
她被下了药，还戴上了一个项圈，如果她试图取下或逃跑，项圈就会爆炸。
这是以利亚干的，现在他告诉她必须等到我们凑齐“另外两个”。
我给了她一些弹药和食物，至少以利亚给了她一把步枪来自卫。
不过我可以让她进来。但我不能让她进来。
如果以利亚在这里集结了一支奴隶军队，那我可不想被卷进去，
我敢打赌那些项圈里有追踪信标。

我得准备离开这个区域了。我打算接管下水道。
那里的狂尸鬼似乎对我不怀敌意，而且还能有效地保护我免受鬼人和以利亚的侵扰。

专注丸黑色:
壮大灵
曼他特
纯净水
阿伯莱萨清洁剂

云泥:
啤酒。
速食薯泥,
瓶装毒云残渣。

肉糕:

猪肉和豆，
饱饱牌肉罐头，
面粉。
